tool_description: Convert any currency and get real time rate result
name: Currency Convertor API
title: Currency Convertor API

api_list.name: Convert any currency
api_list.description: To convert currency you have to enter the amount and currency code
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-convertor-api.p.rapidapi.com/convert/1/USD/RUB"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-convertor-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://currency-convertor-api.p.rapidapi.com/convert/{amount}/{is_from}/{to}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "currency-convertor-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
